file_content.text: [Distress call intercepted from freelance operative Giana Kayl. Playback initiated.]
--hit! Repeat, I'm hit! Meridian Grace is going down!
Cargo's too important to lose. A gift from Tai Cordan. Lists of major supply caches, hidden before the occupation.
Activating all droids on board. They'll protect the data disc. We, we're not going to make it.
[You realize that finding these supply caches could do massive damage to the resistance movement and quickly download the data.]
